overview: Shayan (Pejman Bazeghi) is a successful lawyer, who falls in love with a woman and attempts to perform illegal actions on a case. Although he owes his success to his wife Diba (Leyla Otadi), he finds in himself in a similar case and on the verge of losing everything when Rosa (Shaghayegh Farahani), his wife from his temporary marriage, enters his personal life.
title: Afsongar
